程序包 game

类 ResetManager

java.lang.Object
game.ResetManager
public class ResetManager
extends java.lang.Object
A global Singleton manager that does soft-reset on the instances. HINT: refer to Bootcamp Week 5 about static factory method. A3: Think about how will you improve this implementation in the future assessment. What could be the drawbacks of this implementation?

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型 字段 说明
    private static ResetManager instance
    A singleton reset manager instance
    private java.util.List<Resettable> resettableList
    A list of resettable instances (any classes that implements Resettable, such as Player implements Resettable will be stored in here)

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    限定符 构造器 说明
    private ResetManager()
    Constructor

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    void appendResetInstance​(Resettable resettable)
    Add the Resettable instance to the list FIXME: it does nothing, you need to implement it :)
    private void cleanUp()
    clean up instances (actor, item, or ground) that doesn't exist anymore in the map FIXME: it does nothing, you need to implement it :)
    static ResetManager getInstance()
    Get the singleton instance of reset manager
    void run()
    Reset the game by traversing through all the list By doing this way, it will avoid using `instanceof` all over the place.

    从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • 字段详细资料

    • resettableList

      private java.util.List<Resettable> resettableList
      A list of resettable instances (any classes that implements Resettable, such as Player implements Resettable will be stored in here)

    • instance

      private static ResetManager instance
      A singleton reset manager instance

  • 构造器详细资料

    • ResetManager

      private ResetManager()
      Constructor

  • 方法详细资料

    • getInstance

      public static ResetManager getInstance()
      Get the singleton instance of reset manager
      返回:
      ResetManager singleton instance

    • run

      public void run()
      Reset the game by traversing through all the list By doing this way, it will avoid using `instanceof` all over the place. FIXME: it does nothing, you need to implement it :)

    • appendResetInstance

      public void appendResetInstance​(Resettable resettable)
      Add the Resettable instance to the list FIXME: it does nothing, you need to implement it :)
      参数:
      resettable - the interface instance

    • cleanUp

      private void cleanUp()
      clean up instances (actor, item, or ground) that doesn't exist anymore in the map FIXME: it does nothing, you need to implement it :)
